attributes.action: refocus government and all party's on the wishes of the voters rather than lobby groups.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Publicise more openly the amount of  access lobby groups have to the houses of parliament and our representatives. This is a proposal to refocus MP's on the wishes of the people rather than the special interest groups.

It is important that all people including minorities and specialist groups have access to MP'w however, it is felt the lobby groups have a disproportianate say in UK politics compared to  the majority of electors.

The result of this would be to strengthen our democracy.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
